Luck.help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 12.5% for 60 seconds.
Luck.attackerHit: You now have {PowerName} and slightly increase your Defense.

Sturdy.help: Increases all your Damage Resistance by 10% for 60 seconds. Sturdy also protects you from enemy Teleportation.
Sturdy.attackerHit: You are Sturdy and take a little less damage from attacks and can resist enemy Teleportation.

Insight.help: Makes your attacks 7.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 25% for 60 seconds.
Insight.targetHelp: Makes your attacks 7.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 25% for 60 seconds.
Insight.attackerHit: You have {PowerName} into your enemy's weaknesses and slightly increase your chance To Hit and your Perception.

Respite.attackerHit: You take a {PowerName} and gain some Hit points back.

Enrage.help: Increases all your damage by 25% for 60 seconds.
Enrage.attackerHit: You are Enraged and strike with slightly more damage.

Discipline.help: Slightly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 120 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
Discipline.targetHelp: Slightly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 120 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
Discipline.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects.

Break_Free.help: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 30 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Break_Free.targetHelp: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 30 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Break_Free.attackerHit: You are now able to Break Free from most effects.

Awaken.help: If you are defeated, you can wake up with 1/4 of your hit points. You will, however, be Disoriented, have no Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for 20 seconds, but you will be protected from XP Debt for 10 seconds.
Awaken.targetHelp: You have been Awakened. You are Disoriented and cannot recovery Endurance. However, you are protected from XP Debt for 10 seconds.
Awaken.attackerHit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel quite weak and cannot do anything for a long while.
